inputIdeas.description: Develop modular charging hubs in key logistics locations through partnerships with real estate developers and local governments.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Create value by leasing space in logistics parks and partnering with developers who provide the land, while charging for electricity usage and membership fees.

inputIdeas.description: Collaborate with warehouse owners to install solar panels on rooftops, using the energy generated to power charging stations for electric trucks.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Reduce costs by using warehouse rooftops and sharing revenues with property owners, while selling excess energy back to the grid.

inputIdeas.description: Partner with battery manufacturers to implement a battery swap service, reducing downtime for electric trucks.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Sell battery swapping as a service, charging fleet operators for the convenience of quick swaps, while managing inventory and logistics.

inputIdeas.description: Form a cooperative network among fleet operators to share charging infrastructure and minimize individual investment.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Co-share costs and revenues from charging stations, providing discounted rates to member fleets while ensuring high usage rates.

inputIdeas.description: Implement dynamic pricing for charging based on grid demand and time of use, incentivizing off-peak charging.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Generate value by optimizing energy costs and providing cost benefits to fleets willing to charge during off-peak hours.

inputIdeas.description: Deploy mobile charging units that can be moved to different locations based on demand, reducing infrastructure costs.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Lease mobile units to fleet operators, capturing value through flexibility and reduced infrastructure costs.

inputIdeas.description: Establish public-private partnerships to co-fund electric truck charging infrastructure along major freight corridors.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Leverage government incentives and investments from private companies to lower initial costs and ensure widespread availability.

inputIdeas.description: Install charging stations at large retail locations, leveraging existing infrastructure and drawing in potential customers.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Secure agreements with retail chains, sharing foot traffic benefits with stores while making use of existing amenities.

inputIdeas.description: Issue green bonds to finance charging infrastructure, appealing to investors focused on sustainability.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Use the bond proceeds to build infrastructure, paying back through charging fees and capturing environmental benefits.

inputIdeas.description: Collaborate with urban microgrid developers to integrate electric truck charging as part of a broader energy solution.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Share infrastructure costs with microgrid operators, optimizing energy supply and reducing costs through shared resources.

inputIdeas.description: Partner with telecom companies to use their towers for solar panel installations, powering nearby truck charging stations.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Utilize existing telecom infrastructure to reduce installation costs, sharing revenue with telecom providers.

inputIdeas.description: Negotiate bulk energy contracts on behalf of fleet operators to secure lower electricity rates for charging stations.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Capture value by leveraging collective bargaining to pass on savings to fleets, while earning a commission on each contract.

inputIdeas.description: Partner with energy storage companies to incorporate batteries at charging sites, ensuring grid stability and reducing peak charges.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Store energy during off-peak hours and release during peaks, capturing savings from energy arbitrage.

inputIdeas.description: Develop an app where users can list and rent out available charging slots at their properties to truck fleets.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Facilitate a marketplace for charging slots, earning commissions on transactions between property owners and fleet operators.

inputIdeas.description: Offer a subscription-based model for electric truck fleets that includes charging services, maintenance, and energy management.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Generate steady revenue from subscription fees, providing comprehensive services that reduce operational complexity for fleet operators.

inputIdeas.description: Enable vehicle-to-grid technology for electric trucks to supply energy back to the grid during high-demand periods.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Monetize surplus energy from truck batteries, sharing revenue with fleet operators and supporting grid stability.

inputIdeas.description: Work with local communities to co-develop charging stations powered by community-owned renewable energy projects.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Benefit from community investment reducing capital needs, sharing revenues from both charging and energy production.

inputIdeas.description: Integrate charging stations with local electricity cooperatives to access low-cost, community-generated power.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Capture value by purchasing electricity at cooperative rates and providing discounted charging services to members.

inputIdeas.description: Deploy autonomous robots to charge electric trucks, reducing labor costs and increasing operational efficiency.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Enhance service value through automation, charging a premium for convenience and reducing ongoing operational costs.

inputIdeas.description: Provide a data analytics service to help fleets optimize charging schedules and reduce costs.
inputIdeas.core_mechanism: Offer insights as a service, improving fleet efficiency and capturing value through subscription fees.

content.text:
```json
[
  {
    "idea_id": "modular_charging_hubs",
    "description": "Develop modular charging hubs in key logistics locations through partnerships with real estate developers and local governments.",
    "core_mechanism": "Create value by leasing space in logistics parks and partnering with developers who provide the land, while charging for electricity usage and membership fees.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 14.7,
      "capex_est": 20.0,
      "timeline_months": 18,
      "likelihood": 0.65,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: grid connection capacity",
        "market: EV-truck adoption rate",
        "regulatory: permitting/zoning delays",
        "execution: multi-party partnership coordination"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [4.0, 8.0, 10.0, 12.0, 14.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "solar_rooftop_partnership",
    "description": "Collaborate with warehouse owners to install solar panels on rooftops, using the energy generated to power charging stations for electric trucks.",
    "core_mechanism": "Reduce costs by using warehouse rooftops and sharing revenues with property owners, while selling excess energy back to the grid.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 10.0,
      "capex_est": 15.0,
      "timeline_months": 12,
      "likelihood": 0.70,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: solar yield variability",
        "market: charger utilization risk",
        "regulatory: net-metering rule changes",
        "execution: roof structural retrofits"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [3.0, 6.0, 7.0, 8.0, 9.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "battery_swap_service",
    "description": "Partner with battery manufacturers to implement a battery swap service, reducing downtime for electric trucks.",
    "core_mechanism": "Sell battery swapping as a service, charging fleet operators for the convenience of quick swaps, while managing inventory and logistics.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 16.0,
      "capex_est": 40.0,
      "timeline_months": 14,
      "likelihood": 0.45,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: battery standardization",
        "market: OEM alignment and demand",
        "regulatory: hazardous-material handling",
        "execution: battery inventory logistics"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [6.0, 12.0, 16.0, 20.0, 24.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "cooperative_fleet_charging_network",
    "description": "Form a cooperative network among fleet operators to share charging infrastructure and minimize individual investment.",
    "core_mechanism": "Co-share costs and revenues from charging stations, providing discounted rates to member fleets while ensuring high usage rates.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 11.4,
      "capex_est": 8.0,
      "timeline_months": 9,
      "likelihood": 0.60,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: load-balancing across sites",
        "market: co-op member retention",
        "regulatory: cooperative governance rules",
        "execution: decision-making alignment"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [2.0, 4.0, 6.0, 7.0, 8.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "dynamic_pricing_charging",
    "description": "Implement dynamic pricing for charging based on grid demand and time of use, incentivizing off-peak charging.",
    "core_mechanism": "Generate value by optimizing energy costs and providing cost benefits to fleets willing to charge during off-peak hours.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 6.69,
      "capex_est": 3.0,
      "timeline_months": 6,
      "likelihood": 0.55,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: software reliability",
        "market: fleet willingness to shift charging times",
        "regulatory: tariff structure changes",
        "execution: integration with utility data"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "mobile_charging_units",
    "description": "Deploy mobile charging units that can be moved to different locations based on demand, reducing infrastructure costs.",
    "core_mechanism": "Lease mobile units to fleet operators, capturing value through flexibility and reduced infrastructure costs.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 14.05,
      "capex_est": 12.0,
      "timeline_months": 8,
      "likelihood": 0.60,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: unit durability and uptime",
        "market: demand variability by location",
        "regulatory: roadway transport permits",
        "execution: logistics of redeployment"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [3.0, 6.0, 8.0, 9.0, 10.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "public-private_infrastructure_partnership",
    "description": "Establish public-private partnerships to co-fund electric truck charging infrastructure along major freight corridors.",
    "core_mechanism": "Leverage government incentives and investments from private companies to lower initial costs and ensure widespread availability.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 16.32,
      "capex_est": 25.0,
      "timeline_months": 18,
      "likelihood": 0.70,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: corridor grid upgrades",
        "market: throughput uncertainty",
        "regulatory: shifting public funding priorities",
        "execution: multi-stakeholder coordination"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [5.0, 10.0, 12.0, 14.0, 16.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "retail_location_piggyback",
    "description": "Install charging stations at large retail locations, leveraging existing infrastructure and drawing in potential customers.",
    "core_mechanism": "Secure agreements with retail chains, sharing foot traffic benefits with stores while making use of existing amenities.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 12.27,
      "capex_est": 10.0,
      "timeline_months": 10,
      "likelihood": 0.65,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: parking-lot power upgrades",
        "market: retail partner turnover",
        "regulatory: local zoning limits",
        "execution: contract negotiation pace"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [2.0, 5.0, 7.0, 8.0, 9.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "green_bond_financing",
    "description": "Issue green bonds to finance charging infrastructure, appealing to investors focused on sustainability.",
    "core_mechanism": "Use the bond proceeds to build infrastructure, paying back through charging fees and capturing environmental benefits.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 32.54,
      "capex_est": 5.0,
      "timeline_months": 16,
      "likelihood": 0.75,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: project aggregation quality",
        "market: bond investor demand shifts",
        "regulatory: green-bond taxonomy changes",
        "execution: bond issuance compliance"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [4.0, 9.0, 11.0, 13.0, 15.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "urban_microgrid_partnership",
    "description": "Collaborate with urban microgrid developers to integrate electric truck charging as part of a broader energy solution.",
    "core_mechanism": "Share infrastructure costs with microgrid operators, optimizing energy supply and reducing costs through shared resources.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 16.03,
      "capex_est": 18.0,
      "timeline_months": 12,
      "likelihood": 0.60,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: microgrid interoperability",
        "market: urban land-use constraints",
        "regulatory: grid-interconnect approvals",
        "execution: complex power-sharing agreements"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [4.0, 8.0, 10.0, 12.0, 13.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "telecom_tower_collaboration",
    "description": "Partner with telecom companies to use their towers for solar panel installations, powering nearby truck charging stations.",
    "core_mechanism": "Utilize existing telecom infrastructure to reduce installation costs, sharing revenue with telecom providers.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 8.0,
      "capex_est": 6.0,
      "timeline_months": 9,
      "likelihood": 0.55,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: tower load limitations",
        "market: limited charger density per site",
        "regulatory: telecom site leasing rules",
        "execution: nationwide rollout scalability"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [1.5, 3.0, 4.0, 5.0, 6.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "fleet_energy_contracts",
    "description": "Negotiate bulk energy contracts on behalf of fleet operators to secure lower electricity rates for charging stations.",
    "core_mechanism": "Capture value by leveraging collective bargaining to pass on savings to fleets, while earning a commission on each contract.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 5.75,
      "capex_est": 2.0,
      "timeline_months": 4,
      "likelihood": 0.70,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: billing integration errors",
        "market: fleet churn",
        "regulatory: wholesale market rule changes",
        "execution: contract negotiation bandwidth"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [0.8, 1.6, 2.4, 2.8, 3.2]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "energy_storage_collaboration",
    "description": "Partner with energy storage companies to incorporate batteries at charging sites, ensuring grid stability and reducing peak charges.",
    "core_mechanism": "Store energy during off-peak hours and release during peaks, capturing savings from energy arbitrage.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 12.05,
      "capex_est": 14.0,
      "timeline_months": 10,
      "likelihood": 0.60,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: battery degradation",
        "market: arbitrage margin compression",
        "regulatory: demand-charge reform",
        "execution: storage system maintenance"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [3.0, 6.0, 8.0, 9.0, 10.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "crowdsourced_charging_map",
    "description": "Develop an app where users can list and rent out available charging slots at their properties to truck fleets.",
    "core_mechanism": "Facilitate a marketplace for charging slots, earning commissions on transactions between property owners and fleet operators.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 3.38,
      "capex_est": 1.5,
      "timeline_months": 6,
      "likelihood": 0.50,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: app scalability",
        "market: two-sided adoption challenge",
        "regulatory: local permitting for private chargers",
        "execution: trust & payment security"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [0.4, 0.9, 1.4, 1.9, 2.3]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "subscription_charging_model",
    "description": "Offer a subscription-based model for electric truck fleets that includes charging services, maintenance, and energy management.",
    "core_mechanism": "Generate steady revenue from subscription fees, providing comprehensive services that reduce operational complexity for fleet operators.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 14.72,
      "capex_est": 8.0,
      "timeline_months": 8,
      "likelihood": 0.65,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: uptime guarantees",
        "market: pricing competitiveness",
        "regulatory: subscription service compliance",
        "execution: bundled service delivery"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [2.5, 5.0, 7.0, 8.0, 9.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "vehicle-to-grid_integration",
    "description": "Enable vehicle-to-grid technology for electric trucks to supply energy back to the grid during high-demand periods.",
    "core_mechanism": "Monetize surplus energy from truck batteries, sharing revenue with fleet operators and supporting grid stability.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 11.83,
      "capex_est": 22.0,
      "timeline_months": 14,
      "likelihood": 0.55,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: bidirectional charger reliability",
        "market: compensation rates from utilities",
        "regulatory: interconnection standards",
        "execution: fleet participation incentives"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [4.0, 7.0, 10.0, 12.0, 14.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "community_energy_projects",
    "description": "Work with local communities to co-develop charging stations powered by community-owned renewable energy projects.",
    "core_mechanism": "Benefit from community investment reducing capital needs, sharing revenues from both charging and energy production.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 9.12,
      "capex_est": 12.0,
      "timeline_months": 15,
      "likelihood": 0.58,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: small-scale grid integration",
        "market: community participation levels",
        "regulatory: co-op legal structure",
        "execution: local stakeholder management"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [3.0, 5.0, 6.0, 7.0, 8.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "electricity_co-op_integration",
    "description": "Integrate charging stations with local electricity cooperatives to access low-cost, community-generated power.",
    "core_mechanism": "Capture value by purchasing electricity at cooperative rates and providing discounted charging services to members.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 6.03,
      "capex_est": 7.0,
      "timeline_months": 10,
      "likelihood": 0.60,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: co-op metering integration",
        "market: member adoption rate",
        "regulatory: cooperative rate adjustments",
        "execution: revenue-sharing disputes"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [1.5, 3.0, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "autonomous_charging_robots",
    "description": "Deploy autonomous robots to charge electric trucks, reducing labor costs and increasing operational efficiency.",
    "core_mechanism": "Enhance service value through automation, charging a premium for convenience and reducing ongoing operational costs.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 10.0,
      "capex_est": 18.0,
      "timeline_months": 12,
      "likelihood": 0.45,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: robotic navigation accuracy",
        "market: customer willingness to pay premium",
        "regulatory: safety certifications",
        "execution: hardware maintenance complexity"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [3.0, 6.0, 8.0, 10.0, 12.0]
    }
  },
  {
    "idea_id": "fleet_usage_analytics_service",
    "description": "Provide a data analytics service to help fleets optimize charging schedules and reduce costs.",
    "core_mechanism": "Offer insights as a service, improving fleet efficiency and capturing value through subscription fees.",
    "business_case": {
      "npv_success": 4.92,
      "capex_est": 1.0,
      "timeline_months": 4,
      "likelihood": 0.75,
      "risk_factors": [
        "technical: data accuracy & integrations",
        "market: pricing pressure from competitors",
        "regulatory: data privacy rules",
        "execution: customer onboarding speed"
      ],
      "yearly_cashflows": [0.5, 1.2, 1.8, 2.2, 2.6]
    }
  }
]
```

parsedResponse.description: Develop modular charging hubs in key logistics locations through partnerships with real estate developers and local governments.
parsedResponse.core_mechanism: Create value by leasing space in logistics parks and partnering with developers who provide the land, while charging for electricity usage and membership fees.

parsedResponse.description: Collaborate with warehouse owners to install solar panels on rooftops, using the energy generated to power charging stations for electric trucks.
parsedResponse.core_mechanism: Reduce costs by using warehouse rooftops and sharing revenues with property owners, while selling excess energy back to the grid.

parsedResponse.description: Partner with battery manufacturers to implement a battery swap service, reducing downtime for electric trucks.
parsedResponse.core_mechanism: Sell battery swapping as a service, charging fleet operators for the convenience of quick swaps, while managing inventory and logistics.

parsedResponse.description: Form a cooperative network among fleet operators to share charging infrastructure and minimize individual investment.
parsedResponse.core_mechanism: Co-share costs and revenues from charging stations, providing discounted rates to member fleets while ensuring high usage rates.

parsedResponse.core_mechanism: Generate value by optimizing energy costs and providing cost benefits to fleets willing to charge during off-peak hours.

risk_factors: market: fleet willingness to shift charging times
